27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Usamah bin Zaid narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Whoever some good was done to him, and he says: 'May Allah reward you in goodness' then he has done the most that he can of praise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الثَّنَاءِ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Praising For Good
